USAA conducted its business through mail till 1960's before shifting to phone to sell and serve. It introduced its toll free number in 1978. USAA started writing life insurance and home insurance in 1960's followed by the brokerage and banking services in 80's. The company opened its headquarters in San Antonio, Texas in 1976 in an area of 232 acres.
